Uses of Class
checkersMain.CheckersBoard.Ply

Packages that use CheckersBoard.Ply
checkersBoard Provides several implementations of the CheckersBoard abstract class with different strengths and weaknesses. 
checkersMain Provides the main classes and interfaces needed to simulate a Checkers game.

Methods in checkersMain that return CheckersBoard.Ply
static CheckersBoard.Ply CheckersBoard.Ply.getInvertedPly(CheckersBoard.Ply ply)
          Inverts the passed CheckersBoard.Ply, so that the indices would be correct if the board was inverted.
 CheckersBoard.Ply CheckersGameManager.getLastPly()
          Returns the last ply that was taken.
abstract  CheckersBoard.Ply CheckersBoard.getPly(int index)
          Assuming it's Player1's turn, it returns the possible ply corresponding to the passed index.
